content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (1, -60)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (1.0, -60.0)
- Stone furnace at (2.0, -56.0)
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5)

### Iron Smelting Array at (1, 1)
Consists of:
- Three stone furnaces at (1.0, 1.0), (3.0, 1.0), and (2.0, 7.0)
- Three burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5), (3.5, 2.5), and (5.5, 2.5)
- Three wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5), (3.5, 3.5), and (5.5, 3.5)

### Copper Cable Production at (14.5, 14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5)
- Input chest at (14.5, 11.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 14.5)
- Burner inserters at (14.5, 12.5) and (12.5, 14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production at (21.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5)
- Input chest at (17.5, 14.5)
- Output chest at (24.5, 15.5)
- Burner inserters at (19.5, 15.5) and (23.5, 15.5)

### Power Generation Setup (Incomplete)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (37.5, 19.0)
- Steam engine at (43.5, 19.5)
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)
- Multiple pipe groups attempting to connect water system (currently not functional)

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors with fluid connections
- Ensure you have pipes in your inventory before attempting to connect fluid entities
- Plan the pipe route before attempting connections to ensure shortest path

### Errors with power systems
- Steam engines and assembling machines show "not receiving electricity" warnings
- Ensure proper connection of power poles to create a complete electrical network
- Make sure boilers have fuel and water supply before expecting power generation

### Entity placement coordination
- Ensure entities that need to work together (like boilers and steam engines) are placed within proper connection range
- Consider the input/output positions when placing entities to ensure they can be properly connected

### Resource management
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel - ensure constant fuel supply
- Some furnaces show "no ingredients to smelt" - ensure proper input material supply
- Some inserters show "waiting for source items" - verify the logistics chain is complete and supplied
